name: Queen's Tales: Sins of the Past - A Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Queen's Tales: Sins of the Past - A Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

For years, a war has been fought between your father’s kingdom and the Elven King but things have turned for the worse! Your father has been imprisoned and the Elven King is forcing your hand in marriage. Escape your fate and release your father before time runs out!

• CAN YOU REVEAL THE DARK SECRET THAT HAS BEEN BURIED FOR YEARS?
You find that at the heart of this war, a secret has been hidden deep within your own past. Unravel the secret before it’s too late!

• JOURNEY THROUGH PORTALS TO DISCOVER THE TRUTH
Find your way through forests and collect magical potions as you search through interactive hidden object scenes.

• MEET MAGICAL CREATURES ALONG THE WAY
Play through various mini-games and solve challenging puzzles and meet enchanting creatures. But beware, some of them are not to be trusted!

• HELP THE MAGE IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Continue your adventure in the bonus game and enjoy Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible items.
